goals.1: Fitting all belongings into the bin
goals.2: If there is a white and soft object, don't pack it into the box
goals.3: If there is a 1D object, don't pack it into the box

rules.1: you should never pick and place a box
rules.2: when fold a object, the object must be foldable
rules.3: when a soft object in the bin at the initial state, out of the soft object and replace it into the bin
